title: Louis Vuitton Monogram Locky BB
description: Louis Vuitton Locky BB in Monogram coated canvas and black cowhide leather. Featuring gold-toned hardware, single rolled top handle, and front flap with decorative padlock button closure. This opens to a black microfibre interior with a patch pocket. Approximate dimensions: 21cm(L) x 16cm(H) x 8cm(D), handle drop 8cm, adjustable & detachable shoulder strap drop 59cm. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
